quote: You find peace not by rearranging the circumstances of your life, but by realizing who you are at the deepest level.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: The most precious gift we can offer others is our presence. When mindfulness embraces those we love, they will bloom like flowers.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Silence is the great teacher and to learn its lessons you must pay attention to it.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quote: Nobody can bring you peace but yourself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If you are depressed you are living in the past; if you are anxious you are living in the future; if you are at peace, you are living in the present.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Each one has to find his peace from within. And peace to be real must be unaffected by outside circumstances.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Inner peace begins the moment you choose not to allow another person or event to control your emotions.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
author: Ram Dass

quote: When you do not seek or need approval, you are at your most powerful.
author: Caroline Myss

quote: Happiness can only be achieved by looking inward and learning to enjoy whatever life has-and this requires transforming greed into gratitude.
author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quote: Peace is its own reward.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: To forgive is the highest, most beautiful form of love. In return, you will receive untold peace and happiness.
author: Robert Muller

quote: Peace is the result of retraining your mind to process life as it is, rather than as you think it should be.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: When things change inside you, things change around you.
author: Unknown

quote: Let go of the thoughts that don’t make you strong.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: The life of inner peace, being harmonious and without stress, is the easiest type of existence.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Peace begins with a smile.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: You’ll never find peace of mind until you listen to your heart.
author: George Michael

quote: In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Beautify your inner dialogue. Beautify your inner world with love, light, and compassion. Life will be beautiful.
author: Amit Ray

quote: Peace is a journey of a thousand miles and it must be taken one step at a time.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself. Nothing can bring you peace but the triumph of principles.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: We will know peace the day we truly know ourselves.
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: When you do the right thing, you get the feeling of peace and serenity associated with it. Do it again and again.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Your inner peace is the greatest and most valuable treasure that you can discover.
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: Inner peace is beyond victory or defeat.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You cannot find peace by avoiding life.
author: Michael Cunningham

quote: Quiet the mind, and the soul will speak.
author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

quote: Peace of mind for five minutes, that's what I crave.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: Success is peace of mind which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you did your best to become the best you are capable of becoming.
author: John Wooden

quote: You have everything you need for complete peace and total happiness right now.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Inner peace can be reached only when we practice forgiveness. Forgiveness is letting go of the past, and is therefore the means for correcting our misperceptions.
author: Gerald G. Jampolsky

quote: If you cannot find peace within yourself, you will never find it anywhere else.
author: Marvin Gaye

quote: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
author: Buddha

quote: Peace is our gift to each other.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: To live fully is to be always in no-man's-land, to experience each moment as completely new and fresh.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: Breathe in peace, breathe out love.
author: Unknown

quote: Run to the rescue with love, and peace will follow.
author: River Phoenix

quote: When you find peace within yourself, you become the kind of person who can live at peace with others.
author: Peace Pilgrim

quote: Peace is the number one beautiful ornament you can wear.
author: Munia Khan

quote: To understand the immeasurable, the mind must be extraordinarily quiet, still.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: The best fighter is never angry.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Let go, or be dragged.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Within you, there is a stillness and a sanctuary to which you can retreat at any time and be yourself.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: Peace is not the absence of conflict, but the ability to cope with it.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The mind is like water. When it's turbulent, it's difficult to see. When it's calm, everything becomes clear.
author: Prasad Mahes

quote: The soul always knows what to do to heal itself. The challenge is to silence the mind.
author: Caroline Myss

quote: Be at peace with your own soul, then heaven and earth will be at peace with you.
author: Isaac of Nineveh

quote: Peace is not something you wish for; it's something you make, something you do, something you are, and something you give away.
author: John Lennon

quote: Meditation brings wisdom; lack of meditation leaves ignorance. Know well what leads you forward and what holds you back.
author: Buddha

quote: Sometimes you can find peace of mind by transferring yourself to different situations. They're just reminders to stay calm.
author: Yves Behar

quote: You will find peace not by trying to escape your problems, but by confronting them courageously.
author: J. Donald Walters

quote: The kingdom of God is within you.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
author: William James

quote: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: The only way to find true peace is to start by finding peace within yourself.
author: Heidi Powell

quote: When you realize nothing is lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: To experience peace does not mean that your life is always blissful. It means you are capable of tapping into a blissful state of mind amidst the normal chaos of a hectic life.
author: Jill Bolte Taylor

quote: The real spiritual progress of the aspirant is measured by the extent to which he achieves inner tranquility.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Nothing external to you has any power over you.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Compassion does not see the faults of others. It does not see the weaknesses of people.
author: Amma (Sri Mata Amritanandamayi)

quote: To be calm is the highest achievement of the self.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: Peace is liberty in tranquility.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: The only Zen you find on the tops of mountains is the Zen you bring up there.
author: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: There is no path to peace. Peace is the path.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: There is nothing permanent except change.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Fear is a natural reaction to moving closer to the truth.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: To be fully alive, fully human, and completely awake is to be continually thrown out of the nest.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: When you realize how perfect everything is you will tilt your head back and laugh at the sky.
author: Buddha

quote: The greatest prayer is patience.
author: Buddha

quote: Peace is always beautiful.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: The greatest degree of inner tranquility comes from the development of love and compassion.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Peace is not the destination, but the journey itself.
author: Unknown

quote: Inner peace is when you do what's right and let go of the rest.
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: True peace is not merely the absence of tension: it is the presence of justice.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: No one can get inner peace by pouncing on it.
author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good.
author: James Allen

quote: Peace is the eye of the storm, not the absence of the storm.
author: Unknown

quote: The only thing that belongs to us is the time.
author: Seneca

quote: When you make peace with yourself, you make peace with the world.
author: Maha Ghosananda

quote: We don't realize that, somewhere within us all, there does exist a supreme self who is eternally at peace.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: Peace is not the absence of trouble, but the presence of Christ.
author: Sheila Walsh

quote: The more you know yourself, the more clarity there is. Self-knowledge has no end.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: Peace is not something you wish for; it’s something you make, something you do, something you are, and something you give away.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: The greatest wisdom is seeing through appearances.
author: Atisha

quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, not to worry about the future, or not to anticipate troubles, but to live in the present moment wisely and earnestly.
author: Buddha

quote: Peace is every step.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: The peace that we are looking for is not peace that crumbles as soon as there is difficulty or chaos. Whether we are alone or with others, at the beginning or at the end of our life, what we all really want is inner peace.
author: Pema Chödrön
